thread.title: Emmerdale fans furious as psycho Emma Barton turns the tables on Faith Dingle to keep her murderous secret hidden
thread.title_full: Emmerdale fans furious as psycho Emma Barton turns the tables on Faith Dingle to keep her murderous secret hidden

author: Kyle O'Sullivan
title: Emmerdale fans furious as psycho Emma Barton turns the tables on Faith Dingle to keep her murderous secret hidden
text:
Emmerdale fans furious as psycho Emma Barton turns the tables on Faith Dingle to keep her murderous secret hidden It looks like Emma is going to escape justice again Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Psycho Emma turns the tables on Faith in Emmerdale Share this video Get soaps updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Emma Barton has managed to literally get away with murder again after turning the tables on Faith Dingle. 
The game looked to be up for the village psycho, after Faith admitted she had heard every word of the murderer's confession in the church. 
But viewers were left fuming after another twist meant Emma escaped justice once again, as it was revealed that Faith didn't actually know she killed husband James. 
An epic battle between the two feisty women was set up as Faith came to visit Emma in the hospital. Read More Faith tried to blackmail Emma for £10,000 (Photo: ITV) But she turned the tables after seeing Faith's pills (Photo: ITV) 
Emma had tried to silence Faith by hitting her with a brick, but Harriet knocked her down in her van leaving Emma asking God for forgiveness. 
Faith handed back her brick and gave her a chilling warning: "I know what you are. And soon this whole village will know." 
But it turned out that Faith still thought James had committed suicide, and had only heard Emma calling her the devil. Read More It turned out Faith didn't even know Emma killed James (Photo: ITV) 
Earlier, manipulative Emma had turned the tables on Faith, who wanted £10,000 to keep her mouth shut. 
Emma reluctantly agreed, but then saw pills in Faith's handbag and threatened to tell her kids about her addiction unless she stayed silent. 
They both made a dark pact to keep each other's secret, but now Emma knows she's in the clear she could easily use her knowledge to get rid of Faith for good. Emma stormed towards Faith with a brick (Photo: ITV) 
However, Faith did tell Emma that if she said a word or attacked her again she would kill her. 
Furious viewers took to Twitter to as they couldn't believe that Emma had managed to keep her secret safe. 
One viewer said: "NOT AGAIN!! Why keep letting Emma get the better of everyone???? I thought Faith could expose her" 
A second said: " Oh come on writers is that it?? Faith has something on Emma, truth is finally coming out then out pop pills n Emma smiles! Rubbish Faith gave a stern warning to her foe after she tried to kill her (Photo: ITV) 
Another added: "Getting a bit boring now how she keeps getting away with it EXPLOSIVE EXPOSURE soon please" 
A fourth agreed: "Emma should be found out. She shouldn't get away with murder." 
Another livid fan said: "I was so happy that someone finally knew about Emma killing James and this happens! ffs! #ShoutingAtTheTelly" 
* Emmerdale continues on Monday on ITV at 7.00pm Like us on Facebook
